modules.description: This module implements composable handshake circuits for managing data flow with explicit valid/ready signaling, enabling the construction of asynchronous pipeline stages using arrow-based abstractions. The core data type is a handshake arrow that encapsulates IO signals with control lines, supporting operations like identity, function lifting, and sequential composition. It facilitates building pipelined hardware accelerators, FIFO controllers, and communication interfaces where coordinated data transfer is essential. While the main module provides the foundational arrow interface, the child modules extend its capabilities with specialized components for concrete hardware designs.
